creator: asmedes@home.nl
text:
I am using special characters in form field values. If I use the proxy, they are
not passed on the the application correctly. 

Example : <input type="radio" value="blaëbla"/> is sent to the proxy as
"bla%EBbla" which is correct, but the application itself receives it as
"bla%E%EFBDbla" (or something to that effect). Without the proxy, it doesn't
happen.

creator: woolfel@yahoo.com
text:
most likely this is a bug, since handling accent marks and other special 
characters can be tricky. have you tried passing back the text without encoding 
it first?

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 12546
Sample BSH code to save ResponseMessage

creator: sebb@apache.org
text: Seems to be fixed - see Bug 28767
